title: M1 MacBook Pro $249 off in Wednesday’s best deals, plus AirPods 3 hit $150, more
content:
Halfway through the work week, all of Wednesday’s best deals are headlined by a chance to save $249 on Apple’s 13-inch M1 MacBook Pros. That’s alongside the second-best price of the year on AirPods 3 at $150 and a launch day discount on Nomad’s new Sport Slim Apple Watch band. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post M1 MacBook Pro $249 off in Wednesday’s best deals, plus AirPods 3 hit $150, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: You can now save $249 on Apple's latest 13-inch M1 MacBook Pros at new Amazon lows to go alongside AirPods 3 at $150 and more.
